text: The 2019–20 Bundesliga was the 57th season of the German Bundesliga. It was played between August 19, 2020 and June 27, 2020. This is due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Germany. ==Teams== A total of 18 teams participated in the 2019–20 edition of the Bundesliga. ===Team changes=== Promoted from 2018–19 2.
